question: Which quarter shows the best overall restaurant performance based on the stacked area chart?

options.A: Q3 shows the best performance with the highest total area.
options.B: Q2 shows the best performance with balanced metrics.
options.C: The chart cannot determine overall performance accurately due to mixed metrics.
options.D: Q4 shows the best performance with the lowest customer complaints.

explanation: The chart stacks unrelated business metrics (sales, kitchen temperature, customer complaints) into a cumulative area. These metrics cannot be meaningfully combined to assess overall performance. Only individual metric analysis is valid.
